item.title: Recipe for raising dough
item.description: Any school district can win a bond election. The timing of your election does not matter. The tax impact does not matter. Potential opposition does not matter. Local politics do not matter. A stadium project does not matter.

item.title: Strategic Planning for Education
item.description: Our Strategic Performance System represents the culmination of over thirty-five years' experience in Strategic Planning and organizational development for corporations and educational organizations throughout the world.

item.title: Education summit draws crowd
item.description: Though school is out for summer, the quality of education in the Stephenville ISD is never far from the community's mind. That was evident on Tuesday when more than 100 people turned out for a lunchtime education summit at the Virginia Bond auditorium.
